blocks.subject: Agenda for Members Update
text: What topics do you think would be appropriate?  I will have just a few
minutes.  I was thinking CFTC, electronic trading, physical trading forms and
continued opening of power markets in North America to trading.

blocks.subject: Agenda for Members Update
raw_header: ----- Forwarded by Mark E Haedicke/HOU/ECT on 07/17/2000 05:05 PM -----

blocks.subject: Agenda for Members Update
text: We are putting together the brochure for the Members Update in London and
New York.  We would like to list the topics to be covered during each
presentation in bullet points on the agenda.   What topics would you suggest
Thanks in advance for your help.
